posts.title: JVM Fundamentals — Complete Series
posts.summary: A comprehensive series covering JVM internals, from class loading architecture to memory management and execution engine optimization. Master the foundations that make Java powerful, performant, and portable across platforms.

posts.title: JVM Architecture & Class Loading — Understanding Java Fundamentals
posts.summary: Deep dive into JVM class loading mechanisms. Understand Bootstrap, Platform, and Application ClassLoaders, lazy loading strategy, and how dynamic class loading enables Java flexibility and modularity.

posts.title: JVM Memory Management — Heap, Stack, and Runtime Data Areas
posts.summary: Master JVM memory architecture. Learn about Heap structure (Young Gen, Old Gen), Stack frames, Metaspace, and how the JVM manages memory across threads for optimal performance and safety.

posts.title: JVM Execution Engine — From Bytecode to Native Code
posts.summary: Understand how JVM executes Java code. Explore the Interpreter, JIT Compiler with hotspot optimization, tiered compilation (C1/C2), and Garbage Collection mechanisms that make Java performant.
